mapper.select: /* [chn.bhmc.dms.crm.dmm.service.dao.MembershipTransDAO.selectMembershipTransMngsByConditionCnt] */ SELECT COUNT(*) AS VALUE FROM CR_0806T A INNER JOIN CM_1001T F ON A.SIGN_DOC_NO = F.SIGN_DOC_NO INNER JOIN CR_0801T B ON A.DLR_CD = B.DLR_CD AND A.TRSF_MEMBERSHIP_NO = B.MEMBERSHIP_NO INNER JOIN CR_0801T C ON A.DLR_CD = B.DLR_CD AND A.RECEIVE_MEMBERSHIP_NO = C.MEMBERSHIP_NO INNER JOIN CR_0101T D ON B.DLR_CD = D.DLR_CD AND B.CUST_NO = D.CUST_NO INNER JOIN CR_0101T E ON C.DLR_CD = E.DLR_CD AND C.CUST_NO = E.CUST_NO
